t: Amazon’s press-to-order Dash buttons are officially discontinued | The Verge
s: February 28, 2019 - Amazon’s Dash buttons are no more. The tiny stick-on buttons that allowed customers to quickly reorder popular household items with a press have been discontinued by the online retailer, as confirmed by CNET. Dash buttons were priced at only $5 and were available for a slew of brands spanning ...
